Birmingham's Favorite Birthday Party Venue

Unforgettable kids & adult birthday celebrations with halal catering in Sparkbrook

Book Birthday PartyGet Party Package

Searching for the perfect birthday party venue in Birmingham? LUXE VENUE is the West Midlands' most beloved party venue, specializing in unforgettable children's birthday parties, milestone adult celebrations, and family gatherings. Located at 86 Leopold Street, Birmingham B12 0UD in the family-friendly Sparkbrook neighborhood, our venue is surrounded by parks, schools, and family entertainment centers including Sparkbrook Park and Small Heath Park.

As Birmingham's premier birthday celebration venue, we understand that birthday parties are precious milestones in family life. Whether you're planning a kids birthday party in Birmingham for your little one, an elegant 18th birthday celebration, or a memorable 50th birthday milestone, LUXE VENUE provides the perfect space, halal catering, and professional coordination that makes your birthday truly special.

Why Families Choose LUXE VENUE for Birthday Parties

When searching for birthday party venues in Birmingham, families need more than just a hall‚Äîthey need a venue that understands family values, provides safe spaces for children, and offers quality halal food. LUXE VENUE has earned the trust of families across Birmingham, Small Heath, Bordesley Green, Tyseley, Acocks Green, Hall Green, Moseley, Balsall Heath, Sparkhill, Solihull, and surrounding areas.

Our Sparkbrook location (B12 postcode) is ideal for family celebrations. The area is home to several popular Birmingham schools including Sparkbrook Primary School, Golden Hillock School, and International School, making it familiar territory for many families. Your guests traveling from Small Heath (8 minutes drive), Tyseley (10 minutes), Bordesley Green (12 minutes), or Acocks Green (15 minutes) will find our venue conveniently accessible with ample free parking.

What makes LUXE VENUE the best kids party venue in Birmingham is our child-friendly approach combined with cultural sensitivity. We've hosted hundreds of Pakistani children's birthdays with traditional games and halal food, Indian kids parties with Bollywood themes, multicultural celebrations blending cultures, and Muslim family gatherings with prayer facilities and modest entertainment options.

Adult Birthday Celebrations & Milestone Parties

Planning a milestone birthday in Birmingham? LUXE VENUE specializes in elegant adult birthday celebrations including 18th birthday parties, 21st celebrations, 30th birthdays, 40th milestone events, 50th golden birthdays, 60th diamond celebrations, and beyond. Our sophisticated space transforms into the perfect setting for memorable adult parties.

For adult birthday parties in Birmingham, we offer upscale amenities including professional DJ setup, elegant table decorations, sophisticated lighting, premium halal catering with international cuisine, full projection system for photo slideshows and videos, and private bar-free environment respecting Muslim values. Whether you want a formal sit-down dinner or a lively celebration with dancing, LUXE VENUE adapts to your vision.

Delicious Halal Party Food Everyone Loves

Every great birthday party in Birmingham needs delicious food! Our 100% halal catering includes crowd-pleasing options for all ages. Kids party menus feature chicken nuggets, mini pizzas, halal hot dogs, sandwiches, vegetable sticks with dip, fresh fruit platters, cupcakes, and birthday cake service. Adult party menus offer Pakistani karahi and biryani, Indian curry selection, seekh kebabs and chicken tikka, international fusion dishes, elegant appetizers, and stunning dessert displays.

For families seeking party catering in Birmingham that's both delicious and halal-certified, LUXE VENUE delivers exceptional quality. We source from Birmingham's best halal suppliers and work with experienced chefs who understand that party food should be fun, flavorful, and worry-free for Muslim families.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is LUXE VENUE suitable for children's birthday parties in Birmingham?

Absolutely! LUXE VENUE is one of Birmingham's most popular kids party venues. We host children's birthdays for ages 1-16, providing safe, supervised spaces with entertainment options, halal party food, customizable themes (princess, superhero, unicorn, football), and dedicated party coordinators. Located in Sparkbrook B12, we serve families from across Birmingham, Solihull, Small Heath, Bordesley Green, and Tyseley.

Do you host adult birthday parties and milestone celebrations?

Yes! We specialize in milestone birthday celebrations including 18th, 21st, 30th, 40th, 50th, and 60th birthdays. Our adult party venue accommodates up to 70 guests with elegant setups, professional sound system for music and speeches, halal catering with sophisticated menus, and full bar-free environment. Perfect for families seeking classy birthday celebrations in Birmingham.

What entertainment options are available for birthday parties?

We can arrange various entertainment including bouncy castles (weather permitting), face painters, balloon artists, magicians, clowns, DJ services, karaoke setup, photo booths, games coordinators, and themed character appearances. Our sound system is perfect for party music, and we have space for dancing and games.

Is the birthday party food halal certified?

Yes, all our birthday catering is 100% halal certified. Popular kids party menus include chicken nuggets, mini pizzas, samosas, sandwiches, fruit platters, and halal jelly. Adult party menus feature Pakistani karahi, biryani, seekh kebabs, samosas, and international fusion dishes. We accommodate all dietary requirements including vegetarian, vegan, and allergy-friendly options.

How much does a birthday party cost at LUXE VENUE Birmingham?

Kids birthday party packages start from ¬£600 including 3-hour venue hire, tables, chairs, and basic d√©cor. Catering costs ¬£8-15 per child. Adult birthday packages start from ¬£800 for venue hire with catering from ¬£15-30 per person. A complete kids party for 30 children typically costs ¬£1,000-1,500 including everything.

Can we bring our own birthday cake and decorations?

Absolutely! You're welcome to bring your own birthday cake, decorations, balloons, party favors, and entertainment. We provide tables for cake display, refrigeration if needed, and help with setup. Many Birmingham families bring custom cakes from local Asian bakeries like Kashmiri Bakers or Sweet Centre.

What areas of Birmingham do you serve for birthday parties?

Located in Sparkbrook (B12), we're easily accessible from Small Heath (8 mins), Tyseley (10 mins), Bordesley Green (12 mins), Acocks Green (15 mins), Hall Green (12 mins), Moseley (10 mins), Balsall Heath (8 mins), Sparkhill (5 mins), and across Birmingham, Solihull, and surrounding areas.

How long can we book the venue for birthday parties?

Standard birthday party bookings are 3-4 hours. Kids parties typically run 2pm-5pm or 4pm-7pm on weekends. Adult birthday celebrations often book 6pm-11pm slots. Extended hours available for an additional fee. We offer flexible timing for weekday parties and off-peak discounts.

Is there parking available for birthday party guests?

Yes, free on-street parking is available on Leopold Street and surrounding roads in Sparkbrook. The venue is also accessible via public transport - 10 minutes from Birmingham city centre, well-connected by buses (4, 5, 6, 50 routes), making it convenient for families traveling from different Birmingham areas.

Do you offer birthday party packages with everything included?

Yes! Our all-inclusive birthday packages include venue hire, themed decorations, tables and chairs, halal party food, birthday cake service, entertainment coordination, party host, setup and cleanup, and party bags. Packages range from ¬£1,200-2,500 depending on guest count and entertainment choices.
